Source Code for Module zinnia.urls.categories

 1  """Urls for the Zinnia categories""" 
 2  from django.conf.urls.defaults import url 
 3  from django.conf.urls.defaults import patterns 
 4   
 5  from zinnia.models import Category 
 6   
 7  category_conf = {'queryset': Category.tree.all()} 
 8   
 9  urlpatterns = patterns('', 
10                         url(r'^$', 'django.views.generic.list_detail.object_list', 
11                             category_conf, 'zinnia_category_list'), 
12                         ) 
13   
14  urlpatterns += patterns('zinnia.views.categories', 
15                          url(r'^(?P<path>[-\/\w]+)/page/(?P<page>\d+)/$', 
16                              'category_detail', 
17                              name='zinnia_category_detail_paginated'), 
18                          url(r'^(?P<path>[-\/\w]+)/$', 'category_detail', 
19                              name='zinnia_category_detail'), 
20                          )
